org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.name: OTZLineList
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.description: An excel export of the OTZ form variables
org.openmrs.module.reporting.dataset.def.sqlQuery:
SELECT global_property.property_value as DatimCode, pid2.identifier as PepfarID, pid3.identifier as HospID, person.gender as Sex, DATE_FORMAT(person.birthdate,'%d-%b-%Y') as DOB, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,enc.encounter_datetime) as `AgeAtEnrollment`, TIMESTAMPDIFF(YEAR,person.birthdate,CURDATE()) as `CurrentAge`, visit.visit_id as VisitID, DATE_FORMAT(enc.encounter_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y') as DateEnrolledIntoOTZ, DATE_FORMAT(getdatevalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsid(patient.patient_id,5096,enc.encounter_datetime)),'%d-%b-%Y') as `AppointmentDateBeforeEnrollment`, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,enc.encounter_datetime)) as `PickupDateBeforeEnrollment`, getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165290,14,enc.encounter_datetime)) as `AdherenceBeforeEnrollment`, getnumericvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsid(patient.patient_id,856,enc.encounter_datetime)) as `ViralLoadBeforeEnrollment`, DATE_FORMAT(getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsid(patient.patient_id,856,enc.encounter_datetime)),'%d-%b-%Y') as `ViralLoadBeforeEnrollmentDate`,
getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27, :cutoffDate)) as `LastPickupDate`, getconceptval(getmaxconceptobsid(patient.patient_id,162240,:cutoffDate),159368,patient.patient_id) as `DaysOfARVRefil`, DATE_FORMAT(getdatevalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsid(patient.patient_id,5096,:cutoffDate)),'%d-%b-%Y') as `AppointmentDateFollowup`, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,:cutoffDate)) as `PickupDateFollowUp`, getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165290,14,:cutoffDate)) as `AdherenceFollowUp`, getnumericvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsid(patient.patient_id,856,:cutoffDate)) as `ViralLoadFollowUp`, DATE_FORMAT(getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsid(patient.patient_id,856,:cutoffDate)),'%d-%b-%Y') as `ViralLoadFollowUpDate`, getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,164507,:cutoffDate)) as `LastPedFirstLine`, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,164507,:cutoffDate)) `LastPedFirstLineDate`, getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,164514,:cutoffDate)) as `LastPedSecondLine`, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,164514,:cutoffDate)) `LastPedSecondLineDate`, getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,165703,:cutoffDate)) as `LastPedThirdLine`, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,165703,:cutoffDate)) `LastPedThirdLineDate`,
getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,164506,:cutoffDate)) as `LastAdultFirstLine`, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,164506,:cutoffDate)) `LastAdultFirstLineDate`, getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,164513,:cutoffDate)) as `LastAdultSecondLine`, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,164513,:cutoffDate)) `LastAdultSecondLineDate`, getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,165702,:cutoffDate)) as `LastAdultThirdLine`, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformidvaluecoded(patient.patient_id,165708,27,165702,:cutoffDate)) `LastAdultThirdLineDate`, getcodedvalueobsid(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165470,13,:cutoffDate)) as `PatientOutcome`, getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165470,13,:cutoffDate)) as `PatientOutcomeDate`,
IFNULL(MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=165470,cn1.name,null)) , getoutcome( getobsdatetime(getmaxconceptobsidwithformid(patient.patient_id,165708,27,:cutoffDate)), getconceptval(MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=162240,obs.obs_id,null) ),159368,patient.patient_id) , 28, IF(:cutoffDate IS NULL or :cutoffDate = '', CURDATE(),:cutoffDate) ) ) as `CurrentARTStatus`,
MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166273,DATE_FORMAT(obs.value_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y'), NULL)) as `DateTransitionedToAdultClinic`,
MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166275,cn1.name, NULL)) as `OTZProgramOutcome`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166008,DATE_FORMAT(obs.value_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y'), NULL)) as `DateofOutcome`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166355,cn1.name, NULL)) as `ReturningPatient`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166354,DATE_FORMAT(obs.value_datetime,'%d-%b-%Y'), NULL)) as `DateReturned`, MAX(IF(obs.concept_id=166352,obs.value_text, NULL)) as `ReactivatedBy` FROM obs LEFT JOIN patient ON(patient.patient_id=obs.person_id and obs.voided=0 and patient.voided=0) LEFT JOIN person ON(person.person_id=patient.patient_id and person.voided=0) LEFT join encounter enc on(enc.encounter_id=obs.encounter_id and enc.voided=0 and obs.voided=0 and enc.form_id=73) LEFT JOIN visit on (enc.visit_id=visit.visit_id and visit.voided=0) left join concept_name cn1 on(obs.value_coded=cn1.concept_id and cn1.locale='en' and cn1.locale_preferred=1) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid2 on(pid2.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid2.identifier_type=4 and pid2.voided=0) LEFT JOIN patient_identifier pid3 on(pid3.patient_id=patient.patient_id and patient.voided=0 and pid3.identifier_type=5 and pid3.voided=0) LEFT JOIN global_property on(global_property.property='facility_datim_code') LEFT JOIN patient_program pprg on(pprg.patient_id=patient.patient_id and pprg.program_id=5) WHERE patient.voided=0 and enc.voided=0 and enc.encounter_datetime BETWEEN :startDate and :endDate GROUP BY patient.patient_id
